text:
e="preserve">Orlando "Orly" Bauzon (November 17, 1944 – September 5, 2020) was a Filipino basketball player and coach. He was born in Calasiao, Pangasinan. Between 1973 to 1978, he played for the Toyota Super Corollas. He also played for the national team for the 1968 Summer Olympics.
Bauzon died on September 5, 2020 from cardiac arrest in Manila at the age of 75.
